fields.description:
Appcelerator Studio 4.1.0 - free commercial edition, http://web.appcelerator.com/product/studio

Aptana Studio 3.6.1 - open source edition, http://www.aptana.com/products/studio3/download.html

on Win8 fail to install, if there is already a Git installed,
it breaks with the error message

"MSYSGIT mandatory prerequisite was not correctly installed".

Especially it doesnÂ´t help to "abort" the GIT installation process by pressing the abort button :-(

I would like to see an option, to avoid the installation of the bundled Git,
and instead look if there is a Git already installed !

Sincerely
Rolf
fields.summary: Appcelerator Studio 4.1.0 & Aptana Studio 3.6.1 on Win8 fail to install, if there is already a Git installed
fields.environment: Windows 8.1Pro, Git Extensions (http://code.google.com/p/gitextensions/) installed = this includes a complete Git installation

comments.body:
Hi  [~hemmerling],

Thanks for your concern . Please try this step:

Create a  shortcut for the actual git installation directory to the folder C:\Program Files i.e. C:\Program Files\Git (where Git is a shortcut) It looks like there are hardcoded paths in the setup program.

let me know if you have any concern


Thanks
